name: melbpt-ttbl
description: Browser based tool for generating .ttbl files for my melbpt project.

scripts.build: npm run build:html & npm run build:sass & npm run build:ts & npm run build:other
scripts.build:ts: make-dir docs/js && browserify -g uglifyify ts/main.ts -p [ tsify -p tsconfig.json --noImplicitAny ] | uglifyjs -c > docs/js/main.js
scripts.dev: npm run builddev & concurrently "npm run watch:html" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:other" "serve docs"
scripts.builddev: npm run build:html & npm run builddev:sass & npm run builddev:ts & npm run build:other
scripts.builddev:ts: make-dir docs/js && browserify --debug ts/main.ts -p [ tsify -p tsconfig.json --noImplicitAny ] -o docs/js/main.js

author: schel-d
